thread.title: Sally-Anne Whittington
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by Sally-Anne Whittington

author: Sally-Anne Whittington
title: Sally-Anne Whittington
text:
Upon arriving at the RedSpot desk in Adelaide airport we were greeted in a friendly manner and with a smile. Our rental was completed smoothly and quickly and we were directed to where the car was. Brilliant. All went smoothly and on returning the keys the following day, the same lady was behind the counter and we were again, greeted in a friendly and courteous manner. All great.
The car was an automatic even though we had booked a manual one, but this didn't matter. It was clean and had been well cared for. It certainly served its purpose as we were only in Adelaide for the one night.
